org.dayatang.configuration

Interface Configuration

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    WritableConfiguration
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConfiguration, ConfigurationDbImpl, ConfigurationFileImpl, ConfigurationUrlImpl, SimpleConfiguration

    public interface Configuration
    用于读取全局性配置信息的接口。
    Author:
    yyang (gdyangyu@gmail.com)
